Package com.hac.Blocker

Class BlockerDecorator

java.lang.Object
com.hac.Blocker.BlockerDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockerCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockedUrlBlocker, CookieBlocker, HTMLBlocker, ImageBlocker
public abstract class BlockerDecorator extends Object implements BlockerCommand
The BlockerDecorator abstract class implements the BlockerCommand interface and serves as a base class for various URL blocking decorators. It allows for the dynamic combination of different blocking behaviors, utilizing the decorator design pattern.

  • Field Details

    • blockerCommand

      protected BlockerCommand blockerCommand
      The blockerCommand field is a reference to the underlying BlockerCommand that this decorator is wrapping. It allows the decorator to delegate the execution of the command to the wrapped command and apply additional blocking behaviors.

    • BlockerDecorator

      Constructor for the BlockerDecorator class.

      blockerCommand - The BlockerCommand instance to be decorated by this class.

    • execute

      public HttpURLConnection execute(String url) throws Exception
      Executes the decorated blocking command on the given URL.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface BlockerCommand
      Parameters:
      url - The string representation of the URL to be checked.
      Returns:
      HttpURLConnection An open connection to the reachable and non-blocked URL.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any exception occurs during the execution of the blocking command.
